IMPORT_DIALOG.TITLE: Manual Ingest
IMPORT_DIALOG.FILE_FORMAT_DETAIL_INFO: The import file must be in csv format, encoded in UTF8, with semicolon separator
IMPORT_DIALOG.WRONG_FORMAT: The file format is not supported, please choose a {{ format }} format
IMPORT_DIALOG.ERRORS_DURING_IMPORT:
One or more errors have been identified in the import file.
Please review the details of these errors and correct the import file.

IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE.FILE_SIZE_TOO_BIG: the import file must not exceed 2 MB.
IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE.ONLY_ONE_HEADER_INCORRECT_SEPARATOR: There is only one column found in the file, the separator may be incorrect.
IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE.FILE_MUST_RESPECT_COLUMNS_LENGTH: The file must respect the number of columns.
IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE.FILE_MUST_RESPECT_COLUMN_NAME: Column {{ column }}, line {{ line }}: the expected name for this column is '{{ data }}'
IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE.AT_LEAST_ONE_LINE: The file must contain at least 1 line in addition to the header.
IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE.BAD_ROWS_LENGTH_IN_LINE: the line {{ line }} does not respect the number of columns.
IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE.MANDATORY_VALUE: Column {{ column }}, line {{ line }}: the value must be filled in.
IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE.NOT_ALLOWED_VALUE: Column {{ column }}, row {{ line }}: value '{{ data }}' is not one of the allowed values.
IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE.ISO_8859_1_ONLY: Column {{ column }}, line {{ line }}: value '{{ data }}' does not respect ISO-8859-1 characters.
IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE.REJECT_BY_VITAM_CHECK_LOGBOOK_OPERATION_: Import failed. Please consult the error details in the operations log.
